pages.title: 灰鲭鲨
pages.text: 灰鲭鲨($(o); Māori: /ˈmaːko/; Isurus oxyrinchus$()), also known as the blue pointer or bonito shark，是一种大型鲭鲨。$(br2)It is commonly referred to as the mako shark, as is the longfin mako shark ($(o)Isurus paucus).$(br2)The shortfin mako can reach a size of 4 m ($(o)13 ft$()) in length.

pages.title: 灰鲭鲨
pages.text: 相对大小：★★★☆☆$(br2)始终活动$(br2)1种肤色$(br2)最喜欢的食物：untamedwilds:chum$(br2)种类数量：3$(br2)成长时间：7天
